spiritsExplanation:
The workout is best classified under 'High-Energy & Intense' due to several explicit markers: the description indicates an explosive workout with pieces focused on power and speed, culminating in an 'all-out' effort. The intensity level of 3 out of 3 further supports this categorization, as does the presence of high-energy music genres such as dance and global hits. These indicators result in a very strong match, scoring 0.95.

'Flow & Rhythm' is also relevant, scoring 0.7, due to the emphasis on rhythm (“Max rhythm: 30”) and the music-driven nature of the session utilizing remixed tracks which suggest a coordinated, music-integrated workout flow.

'Structured & Disciplined' is another spirit to consider, with a moderate match of 0.6. The workout forms part of a structured weekly program ('Week 3 of 5'), with specific time allocations for each segment (5-minute pieces followed by a 1-minute effort), reflecting a methodical, disciplined approach.

Other spirits like 'Soothing & Restorative', 'Sport & Agility', and 'Outdoor & Adventure' are excluded based on lack of indicators of relaxation or recovery focus, agility training, or outdoor elements.
